page.title: 07RECREATION.
page.content: { York City Football Ground.}Bootham Crescent has been the ground of Y.C.F.C. since 1922.Its crowd capacity is 13,500.It drew average gates of 5,500 in the 1984/85 season.The highest goal scorer for the season was Keith Houchen with 18 goals.They are in the third division. { The Railway Institute}caters for football,rugby,cricket,tennis and hockey.It covers 17 acres,one big playing field and four tennis courts.There are 180-190 members.The Institute is run by the British Rail Sports Association. { The Homestead}is owned by Rowntrees Trust and is open to the public.It has gardens and a play area with more equipment than any other park in the area. { My den}is made of a tree's branches. We are always making it better.
